desc: Hi, I'm John. I attended Northeastern University to get a BS in Computer Science & Mathematics, and I have continued my studies at Northeastern University to pursue a MS in Computer Science. Some areas of focus include backend API development, privacy & security, and computer networks.

user.title: Languages
user.desc: My most used languages as of recent are Java, Python, and C. I have experience with C#, SQL, TypeScript, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, and Scala.

user.title: Back-End
user.desc: I have worked on many back-end systems and APIs written in TypeScript, C#, Java, and Python. I am comfortable with client integrations and server-side development.

user.title: Security
user.desc: My graduate studies have been centered around computer networks and cybersecurity. Some studies include packet inspection, exploits, and vulnerabilities.
